meaningMnemonic: You've seen 料理 and probably know it means "cooking." So, what is a <kanji>person</kanji> who does cooking? That is <vocabulary>a cook</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>chef</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
